sentences.sContent: We can develop Buddhism as a string to weave all the beings in a single wreath.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can develop Buddhism as a string to weave all the beings in a single wreath.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以将佛教发展成为一条将所有生物编织在同一个花环上的绳子。

trans.tranOther: a religion of east and central Asia, based on the teaching of Gautama Buddha
